name: Magical Counter - for Playdate
description:
A magical counter i made for the playdate for keeping track of health die when playing Magic with friends. Supports 2-4 player and standard and commander.

I put it as under development, but really consider it pretty done. No plans of adding more, but... I might add extra avatars if I get a sudden spark of inspiration.

Controls are simple:

  • Up and Down or CRANK to change HP
  • LEFT or RIGHT to change player
  • A to change which commander you receive damage from
  • B to reset the counter (only works once a session is running)

This is my first program and I would love it if you left a comment about how you liked it.
